author: John Hayward, John Hayward
title: Human Rights Groups Prepare Lawsuits Against China for Coronavirus Pandemic
description: Human rights website Bitter Winter reported on Wednesday that lawyers are preparing to bring a variety of suits against the government of China for its irresponsible handling of the Wuhan coronavirus epidemic.
content:
Human rights website Bitter Winter reported on Wednesday that lawyers are preparing to bring a variety of suits against the government of China for its irresponsible handling of the Wuhan coronavirus pandemic.
